sentences.sContent: As you lie on your own death-bed you will be as mystified about UFOs as you are today.
sentences.sContent_eng: As you lie on your own death-bed you will be as mystified about UFOs as you are today.
sentences.sCn: 当你躺在你自己临终的床上的时候，你仍将被不明飞行物所迷惑，就像你的今天被迷惑一模一样。

synos.tran: 使迷惑（mystify的过去分词）；使难解

words.tran: 神秘的；不可思议的；难解的
神秘化；困惑不解；骗人的把戏
使神秘化；使迷惑，使困惑
